entry.title: Colored coins or non-fungible tokens
entry.summary: In a forum post, the author expressed their appreciation for the work done on LN and wondered if there was any discussion about exchanging colored-coins or non-fungible tokens through the LN. They also mentioned the possibility of issuance, acknowledging that it may not be possible but recognizing that surprises can happen in this space. The author suggested that adding these capabilities to LN would enable new use-cases.
